content:
I think there might be some confusion here! As a conversational AI, I don't have any information about a freelance writer named Sarah or your interactions with her. I'm a new conversation each time you interact with me, and I don't retain any information about previous conversations or individuals.

If you'd like to discuss how to approach a conversation with Sarah about her novel, I'd be happy to provide general advice. However, I wouldn't be aware of any specific details about her or your previous interactions.

If you'd like, we can discuss some general tips on how to ask about someone's creative projects or writing progress in a respectful and supportive way. Just let me know!
